sentences.english: What's The Biggest Difference Between America Then and Now?
sentences.chinese: 美國今昔最大的變化是什麼？

sentences.english: And I was struck, as many visitors are, by the transformation that had taken place.
sentences.chinese: 我像很多來訪者一樣，被今昔的變化所震撼。

sentences.english: The only difference between campaigning then and now is the technology.
sentences.chinese: 今昔的運動區別僅僅在於技術。

sentences.english: The third chapter makes the comparison of past and present to the exquisite brush portrait's development.
sentences.chinese: 第三章對工筆人物畫的發展做今昔對比。

sentences.english: The picture shows the past and present Beijing Airlines Food Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲北京航空食品有限公司今昔對比。

sentences.english: The vast world of mortals, and where are you?
sentences.chinese: 蒼茫紅塵，今昔你在哪裏？

sentences.english: But I would argue that there is cause for sober optimism in both the Arab present and in the Arab past.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，阿拉伯人，無論今昔，都有冷靜樂觀的理由。

sentences.english: The bustling scene of people coming and going will make you "do not know past and present was Dr Xi."
sentences.chinese: 人來人往的熱鬧場面會讓你“不知今昔是何昔”。

definition: to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 斗轉星移|斗转星移[Dou3 zhuan3 xing1 yi2]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
separated by a generation/a lifetime ago
fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
